```{r include = FALSE}
    library(SGP)
    library(SGPdata)
    library(readtext)

    is_html_output = function() {
        knitr::opts_knit$get("rmarkdown.pandoc.to")=="html"
    }

    knitr::opts_chunk$set(
        collapse=TRUE,
        comment="",
        prompt=TRUE,
        fig.dpi=96)

    if (is_html_output()) {
        options(width=1000)
    }
```
